Indoor/outdoor, professional-grade fitness & wellness center

Private coworking space and board room
Tropical resort-style pool deck
Climate-controlled indoor storage lockers and bicycle storage

Lounge Observatory on the 46th floor will offer residents panoramic views from Tampa Bay to the Gulf of Mexico. residence features

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default”][divider line_type=”No Line”][vc_column_text]One to four-bedroom luxury condominium residences and select penthouse options 
Modern, open-concept floor plans that highlight energy-efficient living through progressive design and planning
Spacious interiors illuminated by floor-to-ceiling windows and glass balcony railings that offer breathtaking views
Large sliding doors in the main living areas and owner bedrooms lead to expansive wrap-around terraces that allow for indoor/outdoor living and prime enjoyment of the Florida sunshine
Hardwood floors in standard main living areas
10-foot standard ceiling height and over 11-foot ceilings in select homes
8-foot entry doors and 8-foot solid-core interior doors throughout
LED lighting and pre-wiring allows owners to add personalized lighting selections
Central air conditioning, heating and hot water systems
Washer and dryer provided in all residences
Large walk-in closets
Designer finish packages offered in multiple styles
All residences are wired for high-speed internet access; Smart home pre-wiring available as an upgrade[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column Gourmet kitchen features

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default”][divider line_type=”No Line”][vc_column_text]Expansive kitchens with premium European-style cabinetry in a choice of finishes
Modern quartz countertops with a waterfall edge and backsplash
Pantries available in select homes
JennAir stainless steel appliance package (built-in double refrigerator; convection oven; choice of gas or convection cook-top; dishwasher; built-in wine fridge in kitchen island as an upgrade)
Deep under-mount stainless steel sink with garbage disposal[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” bg_color=”#e6e9f0″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” class=”list_items” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”padding-7-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”7/12″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-18-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”top-bottom” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

luxury bathroom features

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default”][divider line_type=”No Line”][vc_column_text]Luxurious, spa-style owner bathrooms with double vanities and oversized glass double shower enclosure or free-standing soaking bathtub and glass-enclosed shower
Premium European-style cabinetry
Spacious vanities with elegant finishes
Quartz countertops
Powder rooms in select residences
Sleek Italian tile[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” Breathtaking Views Await

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Anticipated to be one of the tallest residential buildings on the west coast of Florida, The Residences at 400 Central will soar 515 feet above downtown St. Petersburg’s vibrant Central Avenue, capturing breathtaking views from Tampa Bay to the Gulf of Mexico.
